categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic installations

nodes.text: The Galitan broadcast hub was a broadcast hub of the Alliance to Restore the Republic that once orbited a nearby moon Galitan during the Galactic Civil War. Four years after a battle at Fostar Haven, it was brought online to send a distress signal to the New Republic for help, after General Hera Syndulla's fleet were attacked and subsequently forced into the Ringali Nebula, and cut off by the Galactic Empire.
